ComicInfo.Summary:
Unplugged, Part Three: Joan's mission turns out to be a trap.
Chapter 3, Worlds Apart: Professor Cady explains what things were like before the discovered humans.
Brooklyn Blood, Chapter 5: The ghosts of Fort Greene show O'Connor something.
Hostile Takeover, Chapter 1: A man on a horse disrupts Trump's groundbreaking ceremony.
Chapter 8: Angels Come to Comfort You: Kyrra and Rollo escape from the Terripinions.
Conan: The Swamp King: Nataya appeals to Conan to help rescue her sister from the Swamp King.
